snippet.title: Green Hill Paradise - Act 2 - Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Run, jump, roll and fly like never before in Green Hill Paradise - Act 2! The follow-up to the original Green Hill Paradise, GHP - Act 2 promises a Sonic the Hedgehog experience unlike any other before it. Feel the freedom of Sonic, unabated. 

-Explore a massive, lush landscape with countless, intertwining paths
-Loops, rings, springs, ramps, half-pipes, corkscrews and secrets abound!
-Use Sonic's classic physics to their fullest, as all of the action is placed in YOUR hands. 
-Break the speed of sound using Mach State! Test your skills as you hold onto it for as long as you can!

The finalized project will be released in time for the Sonic Amateur Games Expo (SAGE) this fall! Stay tuned to my channel for more details on the exact release date and feel free to leave a comment if you have a question about the project.

Song - Superman by Goldfinger
